item.author: lijiufeng97@gmail.com (Jiufeng Li)
item.description: I’m gradually realizing that inner peace can overcome all trivial disturbances. Reading is the axe that shatters the frozen sea within us.

item.title: On Reading: Advice for Young People in Their Twenties
item.author: lijiufeng97@gmail.com (Jiufeng Li)
item.description: When it comes to reading, giving advice feels almost unnecessary; true lovers of reading will naturally develop their own methods and preferences. One book often leads us to another, effortlessly drawing us into new ideas and stories. I imagine many of you have had a similar experience. But here, I’d like to share a few thoughts on how young people in their twenties might approach reading.
